titles.title: Food Safety Enforcement Act of 2010
A bill to increase criminal penalties for certain knowing violations relating to food that is misbranded or adulterated.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 7/29/2010--Introduced. Food Safety Enforcement Act of 2010 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to impose a fine and/or prison term of up to 10 years for knowingly violating such Act with respect to food that is misbranded or adulterated.
